remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.CleanupCode> delegate with the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers.ExecuteCodeWithGuaranteedCleanup%2A> method.
